Instruction: Cook the seasoned steak and onions in a large deep nonstick skillet with heated oil over medium-high heat, stirring occasionally, until the steak is browned and the onions are tender, approximately 5 minutes.

Combine the tomato sauce and water in the skillet and bring the mixture to a boil over medium-high heat after adding the garlic, chili powder, and ground cumin, cooking for about 30 seconds until fragrant.
Simmer the Knorr® Rice Sides™ - Beef flavor in the mixture, stirring occasionally until the rice is tender, for about 7 minutes. Optionally, serve with chopped red onion and sour cream.
